metadata.title: CVE-2022-28506 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
There is a heap-buffer-overflow in GIFLIB 5.2.1 function DumpScreen2RGB()in gif2rgb.c:298:45.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28506` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

giflib-tools - 5.2.1-2.5ubuntu0.1
libgif7 - 5.2.1-2.5ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: giflib package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.2.1-2.5ubuntu0.1').
